home.title: Flood Relief Hub
home.subtitle: Stay informed and help your community during flood emergencies

requestAssistance.title: Request Assistance
requestAssistance.desc: Submit requests for assistance during flood emergencies to help authorities respond effectively.

availableResources.title: Available Resources
availableResources.desc: View and access available resources for flood relief efforts in your area.

maps.title: Maps тАФ Help Needed & Available
maps.desc: Quick view: where help is needed and where resources are available nearby.

myProfile.title: My Profile
myProfile.desc: Manage your account settings and emergency contact information.

emergency.title: ЁЯЪи Emergency Contacts
emergency.subtitle: Quick access to emergency services during flood situations

safety.title: Safety Tips
safety.tip1: Move to higher ground immediately if flooding is imminent
safety.tip2: Avoid walking or driving through flood waters
safety.tip3: Stay informed via local news and emergency alerts
safety.tip4: Prepare an emergency kit with essential supplies
safety.tip5: Have an evacuation plan ready for your family
